description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 12/02/2005

Nick unpacks his stuff at Bridget’s place, as he does the baby kicks for the first time.  Both Bridget and Nick are ecstatic about their first-born child.  Meanwhile Ridge and Taylor are doing a good job at patching up their relationship.  Felicia reveals that she will not be staying in L.A, and she turns down Stephanie’s offer to be head of designs for Forrester Creations.
